Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local hit = nil local out = nil local humanoid = nil local torso = nil local enabled = false local connection = nil local reload = 5 local hammerStrength = 30 local upStrength = 1500 local children = {} local toAffect = {}
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function onActivated()
if enabled then return end
enabled = true
if hit ~= nil then
makeHammerActive() hit:Play(0.1,1,1) connection = hit.KeyframeReached:connect(sendFlying)
wait(reload) end
enabled = false
end
function makeHammerActive()
local part = Instance.new("Part") part.Transparency = 1 part.formFactor = 2 part.Size = Vector3.new(1,0.4,1)
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(155/255,1,206/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0,1,1) fire.Heat = -5 fire.Size = 8 fire.Parent = part
part.Parent = game.Workspace
local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = part weld.Parent = part weld.Part1 = Tool.Handle weld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,-4.5,0)
debris:AddItem(part,1.5)
end
function sendFlying(stringframe)
if stringframe == "sendflying" then
connection:disconnect()
Tool.Handle.InitialHit:Play() Tool.Handle.Hit:Play()
children = {} recursiveGetChildren(game.Workspace)
for i = 1, #children do if children[i].Anchored == false then
local dist = Vector3.new(children[i].Position.x - torso.Position.x,children[i].Position.y - torso.Position.y,children[i].Position.z - torso.Position.z) if dist.magnitude <= hammerStrength then
local bodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") local height = hammerStrength * (1 - (dist.magnitude/hammerStrength)) bodyPos.position = children[i].Position + Vector3.new(0,height,0) bodyPos.P = children[i]:GetMass() * upStrength bodyPos.D = bodyPos.P/2 bodyPos.maxForce = Vector3.new(bodyPos.P,bodyPos.P,bodyPos.P) bodyPos.Parent = children[i] debris:AddItem(bodyPos,3)
if children[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil and children[i].Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then children[i]:BreakJoints() end
table.insert(toAffect,children[i])
end
end end
end
wait(3.1) sendOut() toAffect = {}
end
function sendForceFieldOut()
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(155/255,1,206/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0,1,1) fire.Heat = -5 fire.Size = 1 fire.Parent = torso for i = 1, 8 do fire.Size = fire.Size + 4 wait(0.2) end fire:remove() end
function sendOut()
if #toAffect > 0 then
Tool.Handle.SendOut:Play()
local co = coroutine.create(sendForceFieldOut) coroutine.resume(co)
out:Play() out.KeyframeReached:connect(function(string) if string == "end" then wait(0.4) out:Stop() end end)
end
wait(0.3)
for i =1, #toAffect do
if toAffect[i].Parent ~= nil and toAffect[i].Parent ~= torso.Parent then
local dist = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x - toAffect[i].Position.x,torso.Position.y - toAffect[i].Position.y,torso.Position.z - toAffect[i].Position.z)
local bodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") bodyForce.force = dist.unit * toAffect[i]:GetMass() * -400 bodyForce.Parent = toAffect[i]
if toAffect[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") ~= nil and toAffect[i].Name == "Torso" then toAffect[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").Sit = true end
debris:AddItem(bodyForce,1)
end
end
end
function recursiveGetChildren(parent)
local kids = parent:GetChildren()
if kids ~= nil then for i =1, #kids do
if kids[i].className == "Part" then table.insert(children,kids[i]) end recursiveGetChildren(kids[i])
end end
end
function onEquipped()
humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") torso = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") hit = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.gravityslam) out = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.staffout)
end
function onUnequipped()
hit:Stop() hit:remove() out:Stop() out:remove() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)
